subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: John Merrick, a native of Long Beach and a product of U.C.L.A., became the first golfer with Los Angeles-area roots to add his name to the list of winners at the Northern Trust Open.
snippet: John Merrick, a native of Long Beach and a product of U.C.L.A., became the first golfer with Los Angeles-area roots to add his name to the list of winners at the Northern Trust Open.
